problems.title: Count Binary Strings Without Consecutive 1s
problems.description:
Given N, count the number of binary strings of length N which do not contain consecutive 1s, using recursion.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print the count of valid binary strings.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2

Sample Output
3
(00, 01, 10)

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
5
hintsList: If last bit is 1, next bit must be 0. If last bit is 0, next bit can be 0 or 1. Base when n==0 -> 1 string.
